definition: to make/to cause/to enable/to use/to employ/to send/to instruct sb to do sth/envoy/messenger
stars of the Big Dipper that constitute the tail of the dipper
to face the enemy/to meet an attack
variant of 凝練|凝练[ning2 lian4]
gate to enlightment (Buddhism)/Buddhism/way/method/(old) south gate of a palace
to bid farewell/tricks of the trade/pithy mnemonic formula (e.g. Mao Zedong's 16-character mantra 十六字訣|十六字诀 on guerrilla warfare)
as the arm moves the finger (idiom)/freely and effortlessly/to have perfect command of
combined assault/to mount a joint attack
records/book/Taoist written charm/book of prophecy (e.g. of dynastic fortunes)
to use fully/to put to use
time immemorial/origin of the universe/the world
